translations: v.消耗，消费；吃，喝；吞噬，烧毁；使……着迷，充满

sentences.sentence: Many people are unaware of just how much food and drink they consume.
sentences.translation: 许多人不知道自己到底消耗掉多少食物和饮料。

sentences.sentence: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.translation: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

sentences.sentence: I can consume at any point along the line.
sentences.translation: 我可以在这条线上任意一点进行消费。
